summary: Improves damage and damage scaling of arrows for T3nd0s SkyRe.
descriptionHtml:
While sneaking about like the boss I am, I realized it took me 17 shots with a Legendary Daedric bow firing Daedric arrows to take down a single Troll on legendary, but only 2 swipes with Wuuthrad. Seemed to be a bit of a problem, so I decided to break my Mod cherry and whip this thing up.
<br />
<br />
<br />Damage Values of arrows (no bolts included, they're O.P. already) have been modified to reflect the rarity of the item as well as the lore (Why would Forsworn fire arrows that are shittier than Iron?) using a multiplicative algorithm - All arrows have improved damage over Vanilla Skyrim and SkyRe but each arrow group has it's own damage scale.
<br />
<br />
author: Osvaldo257
